title: Arizona Radiocarbon Dating Samples of the Shroud of Turin
post:
The handwriting is by Dr.Colntet who corrected the data given by Donahue.
At the top of the letter I can guess to read: “Claude a M.. Le total de 52.36 etait faux; c’est moi qui à rectifiè sur cette copie; j’ai d’autres lettres manuscrites de Donahue. Amitiès, Claude”
“Claude to M. The total of 52.36 was false: I made the changes on this copy; I have other handwritten letters from Donahue”.
The change was 14.27 to 14.72 according with Dr. Van Haelst’s paper and Prof. Jull’s letter to Prof. Fanti.
author: domenico

title: Arizona Radiocarbon Dating Samples of the Shroud of Turin
